caption.p: Kaplan-Meier plots for time to viral RNA clearance of children infected with H1N1pmd09 (A), A/H3N2 (B), and influenza B virus (C). Censored patients are illustrated as plus signs. The median time to viral RNA clearance in each age group is depicted next to the Kaplan-Meier plots. Influenza B virus was not detected in infants aged 6 monthsâˆ’1 year. Asterisks represent significant P values (*.05 < P < .01 and **.01 > P > .001). Abbreviation: CI, confidence interval.
